column1: Algo: by complexity n log n (5), n^2 (2), n^3 (2)

n^2: LCS/edit, Dijkstra V^2

n^3: Bellman-Ford EV, Floyd-Warshall V^3

- Raid 0: shard (stripe) data on disks. Better perf.

- Raid 1: replicas. N-1 resiliency

- Raid 5: 3+ disks + parity disk (spread)
supports 1 disk down
